channel.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
channel.description:
I made this model in like 5 hours. it's not the best 3d model.
This is Dinmoney's Concept from DeviantArt. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/mcuddh.jpg[/img]
3D model Rendered. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15y94rm.png[/img]
3D model Textured with the image. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/ypb13.png[/img]
3D model Smooth. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/11j82zp.png[/img]
3D model Flat. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2hn0uuq.png[/img]
WireFrame. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/o52aoj.png[/img]
How i make my 3D models. Horns were made from Cones extruded Blade was made from Cubes extruded Handle from cubes extruded Rings from Torus mesh
basicly every pointy things were made with cone mesh i used mesh: cubes cylinder cones uvsphere [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/15pl4jr.png[/img]
Credits: thanks to Dinmoney from deviantart for making this concept Image. Me for making this amazing concept image from dinmoney a 3d model.

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

Very nice detailing, the wires are kinda crappy, so it probably won’t subsurf well, you should make your own custom texture to occompany it.
Overall it’s a nice model, when the wires arn’t present, next time I advise you split the model up into many different objects instead of creating one messy object.

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

zyle1992:

Hunters don’t need swords.

Give me a shotgun, rifle, and a pistol. Fuck close combat

@topic - you need to focus on your wireframes. The model impression you had going was killed after I saw that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7

@reyx7 wrote:

He definitely made it, it’s just a poly overkill. It would be pretty useless unless animated, as there is a number of things hanging off of it.

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Can I see your texture that you used? I think you did it wrong. Also, this is his model. Have you seen that wireframe? All jumbled up and full of unnecessary polygons. If he would of downloaded it, the strings on the handle would of been part of the texture, not the actual model. He just spent a lot of time on it is all.

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:401527”]1: I have no grounds to argue whether or not it’s legitimately yours, and quite frankly I don’t care if it is or not.
2: I would go back and edit the horns, the rings in the dragon’s nose, the tie-down straps, and the teeth.
3: Try to make it thicker, and longer of course. Give it your own idea, in stead of just taking Dinmoney’s concepts.
4: It’s called tracing.

Also, try adding colors and more textures, and possibly animations[/quote]

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:401527”]1: I have no grounds to argue whether or not it’s legitimately yours, and quite frankly I don’t care if it is or not.
2: I would go back and edit the horns, the rings in the dragon’s nose, the tie-down straps, and the teeth.
3: Try to make it thicker, and longer of course. Give it your own idea, in stead of just taking Dinmoney’s concepts.

1: I have no grounds to argue whether or not it’s legitimately yours, and quite frankly I don’t care if it is or not.
2: I would go back and edit the horns, the rings in the dragon’s nose, the tie-down straps, and the teeth.
3: Try to make it thicker, and longer of course. Give it your own idea, in stead of just taking Dinmoney’s concepts.
4: It’s called tracing.

Also, try adding colors and more textures, and possibly animations

4: It’s called tracing.

Also, try adding colors and more textures, and possibly animations[/quote]

Ok thank you, I’m working on it, i made it like that because when i work alot on a model straight for like 5 hours i get so bored and tired but i want! to finish it and i start to do stuff quickly and ugly :S

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:10, topic:401526”][quote author=zackasmacka link=topic=498585.msg3646021#msg3646021 date=1309377235]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=498585.msg3646017#msg3646017 date=1309377128]

[quote author=zackasmacka link=topic=498585.msg3646015#msg3646015 date=1309377087]

[quote author=krackkid link=topic=498585.msg3646010#msg3646010 date=1309376804]
I am 95% sure you did not make this.
[/quote]How much proof do you want… tell me what to do to make you believe it’s mine…
[/quote]Well make a video of you modeling something and speed it up, Post on youtube. Then maybe I will believe you.
[/quote]I’m not gonna remodel the whole model again… this took me like from 11pm to 4am.
[/quote]No no just any model lol.[/quote]Give me A pic and i’ll work on it tonight and i’ll make a vid…EVERYTIME i post one of my Forum to this website i ALWAYS get a NONE-believer always…and i always make sure i do everything to make them believe i made them…
Idk if you rememer but you repped me… 13 for my 1st model the Glock i made from the youtube tutorial…

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:2, topic:401526”]Few things wrong…
1.)Im not even sure this is yours.
2.)How is this a sword… its more like the top of a spear.
3.)I see no handle
4.)The finished model looks exactly the same as the first picture which makes me belive that you just downloaded the model from deviant art and posted it here to make you look good which in return will make everyone not trust you and accuse you of stealing other models which you may or may not post in the future.[/quote]

1.you want more proof? you can look everywhere you won’t find annything no download links for this 3d model, i made it…
2.It’s a blade with a sort of dragon head attached to it…
3.The handle is thin…
4.in blender you put the image inside as a background and you start making the model from the picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Hunter's Greatsword - my 2nd Blender Model
item.dc:creator: @zackasmacka zackasmacka
item.description:
@zackasmacka wrote:

I made this model in like 5 hours.
it’s not the best 3d model.

This is Dinmoney’s Concept from DeviantArt.

mcuddh.jpg1024×539

3D model Rendered.

15y94rm.png1024×576

3D model Textured with the image.

3D model Smooth.

11j82zp.png1022×472

3D model Flat.

2hn0uuq.png1022×504

WireFrame.

o52aoj.png1023×532

How i make my 3D models.
Horns were made from Cones extruded
Blade was made from Cubes extruded
Handle from cubes extruded
Rings from Torus mesh

basicly every pointy things were made with cone mesh
i used mesh: cubes cylinder cones uvsphere

15pl4jr.png1024×640

Credits:
thanks to Dinmoney from deviantart for making this concept Image.
Me for making this amazing concept image from dinmoney a 3d model.
